data.taskTitle: user on mac cant click complete button
user on mac cant click complete button
user on mac cant click complete button
data.approach: Investigate the interaction between sendWorkflowCommand, streaming input, and the Complete button disabled state. The issue appears to be that on Mac Chrome, something is blocking the button click or the sendInput API calls.

data.taskTitle: Fix Complete button not working on Mac/Chrome
summary: Changed sendWorkflowCommand to use ctrl-u instead of ctrl-c
ctrl-c sends interrupt signal which freezes terminal on Mac
ctrl-u clears line without interrupt - consistent with sendTextInput
reviewFocus: Verify terminal does not freeze after clicking Complete

Fix Complete button not working on Mac/Chrome

summary: Fixed Complete button freezing terminal on Mac/Chrome
Changed sendWorkflowCommand to use ctrl-u instead of ctrl-c
ctrl-c sent interrupt signal causing terminal to become unresponsive
ctrl-u clears line without interrupt - matches sendTextInput behavior

quality.preExisting: Type warnings in JS files are pre-existing, unrelated to this fix

suggestedTasks.title: Add Mac/Chrome specific testing to SessionCard
suggestedTasks.description: Create browser-specific tests to catch platform-specific issues like the ctrl-c vs ctrl-u difference. Could use Playwright with browser matrix.
suggestedTasks.reason: This bug would have been caught by cross-browser testing

suggestedTasks.title: Add TypeScript types to JS API files
suggestedTasks.description: Multiple API route handlers in dashboard have implicit any types. Adding proper TypeScript annotations would improve type safety.
suggestedTasks.reason: Noticed many type warnings during verification

patterns: Use ctrl-u to clear input line, never ctrl-c (sends interrupt)
gotchas: Mac terminals respond differently to ctrl-c than Linux - can freeze the session
